A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: This was the worst Star Wars period.  Whether you liked The Force Awakens or not\, The Last Jedi completely destroyed the parts of the storyline that people were actually interested in.  I walked out of this film\, a 40 year Star Wars fan\, completely uninterested in what happens next for these characters.  I couldn't be more disappointed and think Rian Johnson made a terrible film.  Poor choices sir.
